input.sentences: the eldest members of the family read off the names of all present .
one of the women cooked in a trash can on an open fire .
while grandpa entertained the youngest members of the family .
a good time was had by all who attended the family reunion .
output.sentences: At the family reunion, my grandmother read all the family names.
The different generations all enjoyed playing games.
The women started a fire in the trash barrel and was cooking hot dogs.
Grandpa entertained the family by telling stories of how things were when he was a kid.
Everyone had a great time at the family reunion.
